QuestData.Title: The Lay of the Land
QuestData.Description:
So, yeah, not sure why he wants you. Based on a long time working for him, I'm gonna say he wants to use you to do something unsavory to further his interests. But, I'm biased. I could tell you so many stories.
Let's go check on my friend, Nadjia.
QuestData.LogDescription: Check on Nadjia and investigate Taskmaster Matyas's camp.
QuestData.RewardText: Appreciate you helping my friend. Keep this up and I'll be in your debt.
